entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
